scripts.deploy:enhanced: cdk deploy -c enhanced=true -c customFeatureName=enhancedApp -c env=dotcomstg --require-approval never --all
scripts.deploy:enhanced:worker: cdk deploy auto-builder-stack-enhancedApp-worker -c enhanced=true -c customFeatureName=enhancedApp -c env=dotcomstg --require-approval never --exclusively
scripts.deploy:enhanced:webhooks: cdk deploy auto-builder-stack-enhancedApp-webhooks -c enhanced=true -c customFeatureName=enhancedApp -c env=dotcomstg --require-approval never --exclusively
